parameters.name: DBName
parameters.description:
The name of the database.

> You cannot specify multiple database names.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be a positive integer that does not exceed the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.
